// src/pages/Home.jsx import PageWrapper from "../components/PageWrapper"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Grid3X3, User2, FileBadge2, FolderOpen, PenSquare, Linkedin, Github, Sparkles, Code2, Workflow, Gauge, Trophy, MessageSquareText, } from "lucide-react"; import { useLanguage } from "../context/LanguageContext"; import { translations } from "../utils/translations"; const card = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 12 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.35 }, }; export default function Home() { const { language } = useLanguage(); const t = translations[language] ?? {}; // safe fallbacks from translations const TXT = { name: "Mohammad Rajabi", role: "Web Developer", tag: "APIs, React, Tailwind, Framer", moreAbout: "Credentials", projects: t.projects || "Projects", blog: "My Blog", services: "Services Offering", profiles: "Profiles", yearsExp: "YEARS\nEXPERIENCE", totalProjects: "TOTAL\nPROJECTS", lets: "Let’s", workTogether: "Work together", }; return (
{/* container */}
{/* Top nav-ish spacer already handled by Navbar */} {/* GRID (12 cols) */}
{/* Profile Card */}

{TXT.role}

{TXT.name}

{TXT.tag}

 {/* Credentials / Projects Card (stacked) */}

More about me

{TXT.moreAbout}

Showcase

{TXT.projects}
{/* Blog + Services + Profiles */}

Blog

{TXT.blog}

Specialization

{TXT.services}

Stay with me

{TXT.profiles}

 {/* Stats + CTA row */}
01

{TXT.yearsExp}

06

{TXT.totalProjects}

{TXT.lets}

{TXT.workTogether}

{t.contact || "Contact"}
{/* footer signature row */}
© {new Date().getFullYear()} {TXT.name} — All rights reserved.
); }
